reference.shortdesc: The tm element identifies a term or phrase that is trademarked. Trademarks include registered trademarks, service marks, slogans, and logos.

section.title: Usage information
section.p: The business rules for indicating and displaying trademarks differ from company to company. These business rules can be enforced by either authoring policy or processing.

section.title: Attributes
section.p: The following attributes are available on this element: and the attributes defined below.

dlentry.dd:
Specifies the trademark type. Allowable values are:
tm Trademark
reg Registered trademark
service Service mark
Specifies the trademark owner, for example "OASIS".
Specifies the classification of the trademark. This can be used to differentiate different groupings of trademarks.
